page.title: 05TOURISM IN ONGAR
page.content: In{11th}century Ongar there was a {motte and bailey castle,}but now only the mound and the moat remain. { Greensted church}is a great tourist attraction,as it was built in 845 AD, making it the oldest wooden church in the world.Around{70,000}people visit the church each year.Excluding the English visitors,a high percentage of the remaining are American and Australian. The{Tolpuddle Martyrs}were sent to Australia for swearing an illegal oath.After many complaints the Martyrs were returned and given a farm in Greensted called "New House".Two of the Tolpuddle Martyrs are buried in the cemetery at Greensted church, and this is why the Australians visit the church.
